title: The White Shadow S01E11 Spare the Rod DVDRip DivX
description:
The White Shadow Season 1 (1979)
S01E11 Spare the Rod

First aired: 2/17/1979 
Coach Reeves substitute-teaches a P.E. class and runs into trouble and has his opposition to corporal punishment sorely tested when Lucius Robinson, a student with a past history of teacher abuse, slugs him. 

Cast: Ken Howard(Ken Reeves), Nathan Cook(Milton Reese), Thomas Carter(James Hayward), Eric Kilpatrick(Curtis Jackson), Timothy Van Patten(Mario Pettrino(Salami)), Ken Michelman(Abner Goldstein), Robin Pearson Rose(Katie Donahue), Ed Bernard(Jim Willis), Joan Pringle(Sybil Buchanan), Jason Bernard(Jim Willis), Jerry Fogel(Bill Donahue), Kevin Hooks(Morris Thorpe), Byron Stewart(Warren Coolidge), Ira Angustain(Ricky Gomez)

Guest cast: Dave Footman (Student), Lisle Wilson (Mr. Finniman), Larry Jenkins (Student), Robert Moloney (Mr. Ellis), Leonard Lightfoot (Teacher), Fred Pinkard (Mr. Robinson), Nicholas Mele (Teacher), Royce Wallace (Mrs. Robinson), Jeff Bannister (Referee), Philip Sterling (Lee Burns), Ronny Temple (Mr. Harris), Brian Stokes Mitchell (Lucius Robinson)
